name: ArtifactVariables
description: Sets the artifact variables for TFS versions that do not support them.
author: Greg Pakes

inputs.name: variableprefix
inputs.label: Variable Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a prefix for the variable names.  Will default to ReleaseArtifacts.  This will result in variables names such as: ReleaseArtifacts.{ArtifactName}.BuildNumber

inputs.name: tfsusername
inputs.label: Tfs Rest Api Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a username that has acecss to the TFS rest Api.

inputs.name: tfspassword
inputs.label: TFS Rest Api Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a password to a user that has access to the TFS rest Api.
